thread.title: PE cop injured in shoot-out
thread.title_full: PE cop injured in shoot-out | News24

author: news24.com
title: PE cop injured in shoot-out
text:
Cape Town - Port Elizabeth police are on the hunt for three suspects after a colleague was shot and wounded in Zwide on Thursday night.
The officers, attached to KwaZakhele police, were following up on reports of suspects walking around with firearms in full view, Colonel Sibongile Soci said in a statement.
The two noticed the four in Ngwekazi Street.
"While searching them, one suspect drew a firearm and started shooting at the police. Police retaliated and a shootout ensued."
